extract_quote_1.quote_text: “The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking. It cannot be changed without changing our thinking.”
extract_quote_1.author: Albert Einstein

extract_quote_2.quote_text: “It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.”
extract_quote_2.author: J.K. Rowling

extract_quote_3.quote_text: “There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.”
extract_quote_3.author: Albert Einstein
